objects.specification: A neutral beige carpet floor covering with slight textured fibers and low pile height, providing a comfortable and quiet surface underfoot. The carpet has subtle tonal variations for a natural appearance and is installed wall-to-wall in the classroom, offering durability and softness.

A clean off-white painted interior wall with a smooth matte finish, providing a bright and neutral backdrop for classroom elements. The surface is uniform and free of blemishes, with subtle texture that softly diffuses ambient light.

A clean off-white painted interior wall with a smooth matte finish, providing a bright and neutral backdrop for classroom elements. The surface is uniform and free of blemishes, with subtle texture that softly diffuses ambient light.

A smooth white ceiling with a matte finish, providing a neutral overhead surface that complements the classroom walls and integrates flush-mounted fixtures seamlessly.

A large rectangular whiteboard with a smooth glossy white writing surface and a slim anodized aluminum frame, designed for dry-erase markers and erasers. The board has a subtle magnetic backing and squared corners.

A compact ceiling-mounted projector housing with crisp white enclosure, featuring ventilation grills, adjustable mounting bracket, and a high-quality lens assembly. The design is unobtrusive and technical details are subtly integrated.

A slim rectangular LED panel light with white housing and frosted diffuser, designed for uniform bright illumination. The fixture is flush-mounted to the ceiling and has minimal visible details for a clean appearance.

A standard student desk with a light wood tone laminated top showcasing a subtle wood grain pattern, supported by slender powder-coated metal legs in matte finish. The desk surface has gently rounded corners for safety and a modest overhang on all sides.

A larger teacher's desk crafted from darker wood tone laminate with pronounced wood grain texture, featuring a spacious rectangular top and integrated modest storage drawers on one side. The desk has sturdy tapered legs and a refined professional appearance.

An ergonomic teacher's chair with dark wood tone frame and cushioned seat and back upholstered in rich leather-like material. The chair features a high backrest with subtle stitching detail and sturdy base support.
A tall rectangular window with clear glass panes set in a slim white frame, accompanied by lightweight semi-transparent curtains that drape gracefully with soft folds.

An analog wall clock with a round silver frame and clear glass cover, featuring a white face with bold black numerals and contrasting black hour and minute hands, topped with a slender red second hand.

A tall wooden bookshelf with a medium wood tone finish, comprising multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with assorted colorful hardcover books. The bookshelf has a subtle decorative molding at the top.
